headline: How Occidental Shares Stack Up After 13% Drop Amid Oil Market Turbulence
summary: Are you on the fence about Occidental Petroleum? It’s understandable, as this is a stock that tends to spark debate among investors, especially after a string of volatile price swings. In just the past month, Occidental’s share price dropped 13.3%, and year-to-date, the slide is a hefty 17.9%. Looking back over the last year, shares are down 19.2%, and for those with longer memories, the three-year return sits at -39.9%. However, before you write off Occidental, it’s worth noting that the...
